venue.name: Microsoft NERD New England Research & Development Center

item.description:
We will be at Sampson/Paul room.

Our goal is to implement a few apps, using publicly available APIs. You can propose apps, code them, or just be an observer. PHP, C#, .net, VB,  Java, Python, Ruby, C++, FORTRAN, or COBOL (just kidding!) are all welcome!

If you want to code, please go through the APIs below.

Agenda:

Step 1: Get to know each other

Step 2: Get to know proposed applications

Step 3: Divide into groups of 3-4 to finish the apps

Step 4: Discussion about how to finish the rest

 

 

Note: We will have no food to save time and money unless the group thinks it is a bad idea.
item.how_to_find_us: Please, call me at 214-714-2224 if you cannot enter.
item.name: Hackathon: Develop/MapReduce Your Dream Predictive Analytics/BigData App.
